title: Branch Sales Manager
tagsAndSkills: Client Acquisition,Branch Sales,Branch Handling,Team Handling,Sales manager,Direct Sales,Client Relationship Management,Area sales
jobDescription:
As a Branch Sales Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth and expanding our market presence within your designated region. Leveraging your strategic acumen and sales expertise, you will lead a team of sales professionals to achieve sales targets, acquire new clients, and foster long-term relationships with existing customers. Your primary focus will be on driving subscription sales and ensuring customer satisfaction through personalized solutions and exceptional service delivery.


Responsibilities:

  1. Sales Strategy Development: Collaborate with the executive team to develop and implement effective sales strategies aligned with company objectives and market trends.
  2. Team Leadership: Recruit, train, and mentor a high-performing sales team, providing guidance, support, and ongoing coaching to maximize individual and collective performance.
  3. Revenue Generation: Drive revenue growth by identifying new business opportunities, cultivating leads, and closing sales deals with prospective clients.
  4. Market Analysis: Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify industry trends, customer preferences, and growth opportunities, utilizing insights to refine sales strategies and product offerings.
  5. Performance Monitoring: Track sales metrics, analyze performance data, and prepare regular reports to assess sales performance, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions to optimize sales effectiveness.
  6. Collaboration: Collaborate cross-functionally with marketing, product development, and customer support teams to ensure seamless coordination and alignment of efforts to drive business growth and enhance customer experience.
  7. Compliance: Ensure adherence to company policies, sales procedures, and regulatory requirements, maintaining high standards of ethics and professionalism in all business interactions.

Qualifications:

  • Any graduation, and MBA/PGDM preferred.
  • Proven track record of success in B2B sales, with a minimum of 3 years of experience in sales leadership roles.
  • Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and inspire a sales team to achieve targets and exceed expectations.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and credibility with clients at all levels.
  • Strategic thinker with a results-oriented mindset and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
  • Deep understanding of B2B sales processes, market dynamics, and customer relationship management.
  • Willingness to travel as needed within the assigned region.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary package with performance-based incentives.
  • Comprehensive health benefits package.
  • Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.
  • Dynamic and collaborative work environment.
  • Work-life balance initiatives.

Join our dynamic team and be part of a company that is revolutionizing the way businesses operate in the digital era. If you are passionate about driving sales excellence and delivering exceptional value to clients, we want to hear from you! Apply now and take the next step in your career journey with IndiaMART.

title: Excellent opportunity For Preferred RM Head@Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Private Banking,private wealth,insignia,Relationship Management,Asset Allocation,Priority Banking,imperia,Sales Management

ambitionBoxData.Title: Anand Rathi Insurance Brokers Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Looking for Preferred RM Head for Mumbai location.

Job Description for Preferred RM Head:


SUMMARY: -


The Preferred RM Head is the ultimate face of our Preferred vertical, as (s) he is going to be the final point of contact with the client.


(S)he would be responsible for acquiring High Net Worth relationships and managing & retaining such relationships by delivering the best standards of services.


(S)he would be expected to establish strong ties with them by designing & implementing their financial plans and then by ensuring that they execute on the right advisory.


PRE-REQUISITES: -


Candidate with prior experience working in a Wealth Management/Private Banking set up, experienced in driving sales through advisory approach of Mutual Funds, PMS, Structured Products and Bonds is a must.


Overall experience of around 9-12 years in the desired role with team management experience of min 3-4 years.


Should have stability of minimum tenure of 3-4 years in the current organization.


Team managing and handling in the current experience is a must.


Should have own set of Client relationships and AUM and also the team client relationships.


ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES: -


Recruitment and managing a team of Relationship Managers / Senior Relationship Managers.

Planning and achieving self and team sales targets through the defined Wealth Management products.


The Relationship Manager will be Responsible for acquiring Preferred clients (HNI/Ultra HNI) (having min AUM of Rs 1 Cr & above clients).


Maintaining client relationships and generate AUM from Preferred clients.


Advising Affluent/Ultra Affluent clients on their Investments and managing their overall financial portfolio and deepening the wallet from existing clients based on Preferred's advisory approach

To learn and update themselves on available investment opportunities/financial market trend to determine whether they fit into clients' portfolios through the various notes shared by product team.


Fulfilling the compliance standards in Financial Planning, Asset Allocation and Product Sales and managing Delinquencies by ensuring proper Sales Process.


Recruiting, training and ensuring seamless induction to the newly joined team members and managing attrition within the team.


To conduct and assist in organizing seminars, workshops and other business development activities.



If you are interested please share your profile on pushpajaiswar@rathi.com or call on 9920799578 for further discussion on the same .



Regards

Pushpa Jaiswar

Human Resource

Anandrathi Group

title: Quality Analyst / Test Engineer - 6 Openings
tagsAndSkills: Manual Testing,QA,Automation Testing,Selenium,Regression Testing,Sikuli,GUI Testing,RTM
jobDescription:
Hi,


Greetings from Alianza Consultants!!


We have an opening for Quality Analyst for our Multiple Clients in Mumbai.



Responsibilities


  • Participate in Requirements and Project meetings.
  • Analyzing application features and integrations for needed test coverage.
  • Work closely with Project teams and provide functionality testing support.
  • Provide Test Estimates for the testing activities assigned.
  • Create Test Plans, Test Scenarios, Checklists, Test Cases, Test Data and RTM needed to ensure the quality of these features and ensure full Test Coverage.
  • Ensure Testing covers all aspects of the application
  • Well versed in SDLC methodology and look for opportunities of QA Process Improvement and follow QA Best Practices.


Must Haves:


  • Experience in a Software QA role (2+ years) is a must.
  • Experience working in engineering teams using agile methodologies.
  • Experience testing REST APIs
  • Experience testing cloud hosted services
  • Strong leadership, conflict management and motivation skills.
  • Good understanding of automation frameworks and support automation efforts and maximize QA capacity across different projects testing support.
  • Deep understanding of and experience of varied Automation development tool sets (e.g Selenium, Cucumber, SOAPUI, TestNG, Sikuli, NUnit, Coded UI, UFT, PostMan, LoadRunner).
  • Proficient in database technologies and concepts
  • Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, both orally and in writing, as an advocate for technology solutions and collaboratively work with both internal and external teams.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving, decision-making skills, with proven ability to design pragmatic solutions.
  • Passionate about current information security, privacy, technology and new trends.


If interested, revert us with your updated CV and below information:


Total Experience -

Exp in Manual Testing -

Exp in Selenium -

Exp in Automation Testing -

CTC -

Offer (If Any) -

Expected CTC -

Notice Period -

If Serving, LWD -

Your Location -

Ready to relocate to Mumbai - Yes / No? -



Mail us your application along with your CV to jobs@alianzaconsultants.com

title: Python Project Lead
tagsAndSkills: Django,Javascript,Rest Api Services,Python,Flask,Postgresql,Mysql,React.Js
jobDescription:
We are seeking a highly skilled hands-on Senior Python Web App Developer to join
our dynamic team as a Project Lead. As a project lead, you will be responsible for
designing, developing, maintaining high-performance, scalable Python applications
with the team. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand
business requirements and translate them into robust technical solutions.
Additionally, you will mentor junior developers, conduct code reviews, and contribute
to architectural decisions to ensure the scalability, reliability, and maintainability of
the software products.



Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain Python applications to meet business
requirements.
• Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to
define project requirements and specifications.
• Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and
coding standards.
• Conduct code reviews, provide constructive feedback and mentor junior
developers.
• Work closely with DevOps engineers to deploy applications and implement
continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
• Perform unit testing, integration testing, and troubleshooting to ensure the
quality and reliability of software products.
• Contribute to architectural decisions and technical designs to ensure
scalability, performance, and security.
• Stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies in Python development
and software engineering.
• Work allocation to resources, team handling and conflict management.


Requirements:
• Bachelors/Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant
work experience.
• 6+ years of professional experience as a Python Developer
or
4+ years as a python Developer and 2+ years experience as a Project Lead,
with a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions.
• Strong proficiency in Python and related libraries/frameworks such as
Django/Django Rest Framework, Flask, or FastAPI
• Hands-on experience with Python libraries like Selenium, Silk, Celery, Boto,
and other important ones and creating REST APIs.
• Experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and non-
relational databases (e.g., MongoDB, Redis).
• Solid understanding of software engineering principles like Solid Principles,
design patterns, and best practices.
• Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and
orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
• Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure)
and serverless architectures.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a
collaborative team environment.
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Experience in mentoring junior developers and conducting code reviews

. Hands-on experience on Javascript, HTML, CSS.


Interested candidates can share their resume at rawat.megha@thinksys.com

title: Manager - Branding & Content Development
tagsAndSkills: Content Development,Brand Management,Premiere Pro,Adobe After Effects,Photoshop,Graphic Designing,Marketing,Design
jobDescription:
Responsibilities :

- Managing the Branding & Creative Content Development department/ team of KVAT & Co and any of its Group Entities.

- Creating content for the firm for Marketing/ Business promotion purposes. Content could be in the form of flyers, posts, greetings, articles, etc.

- Creating and designing knowledge material, branding material, credential packs, capability decks, pitch decks, corporate profiles, brochures, internal and external PowerPoint presentations, posters, etc. for areas of services provided by the Firm and regarding any updates.

- Designing audit reports, proposal documents, study reports, townhall presentations, training material, internal guides, etc. for firm's business and branding.

- Creative designing of branding material for the firm like logos, letterheads, envelopes, merchandise, etc.

- Assist the firm, its Partners, and Associate Director - Business Strategy, Marketing & Content Development, HR & Administration of the Firm in Managing LinkedIn accounts, posts, and associated content on social media.

- Working on and implementing the right social media strategy for the firm to enhance business visibility.

- Advisory and implementation of new sources / avenues for push as well as pull marketing.

- Any other area as identified and mutually agreed upon by both the parties (firm and the team member) in the interest of Firm.

- Ensuring to learn all the necessary relevant skills required to do the assigned tasks well.

- Attending seminars/ training programs/ webinars/ internal and external knowledge sharing sessions.

Qualifications/ Skills:

- Bachelor's/Master's in Arts, or Mass Media and Communication or equivalent degree

- PowerPoint Designing

- Graphic Designing

- Photoshop

- Canva

- Adobe After Effects

- Premiere Pro

- Video Editing, Videography, Video production (not a must have skill)

- Photography (not a must have skill)

- Good communication

- Attention to detail

- Understanding of color palettes

- Market research

title: Sales Executive
tagsAndSkills: Sales,online marketing,cold calling,lead generation,Calling,sales strategy,outbound calling,social media
jobDescription:
Role and Responsibilities :-
- Contribute in the sales strategy for the company for a particular region and understand the requirements from the supply side of the sales function
- Work with the Sales Head and marketing team for all campaigns that will facilitate sales as well as track the campaigns and progress in terms of sales conversions
- Strike strategic alliances with channel partners along with the sales team for the particular region
- Work with the Sales Head and community teams to increase brand awareness across various social media platforms
- Be responsible and accountable for the profit/loss of the sales function for the particular region
- Work on achieving the target level of occupancy of beds across all properties
- Build a pipeline of potential customers month on month and follow up to achieve the highest levels of conversion
- Maintain and expand database of prospects within the assigned territory
- Lead generation & sales conversion - Identify the right channels and source various sales opportunities through inbound lead follow - up, outbound cold calls and emails
- Drive efficiency of lead generation through offline and online marketing
- Strike strategic alliances with channel partners
- Document sales by creating or updating customer profile records
- Close sales and achieve the quarterly targets assigned
- Conduct competitive analysis to understand practices prevalent in the market. Analyse the relevant practices and incorporate the same into the business
